lines.text: [Frank is trying to teach Michael to talk like a mobster]
Here, try this, "Hey, fuggeddabout it!"
Hey, forget about it!
No, like this, "Hey, fuggeddabout it!" Change you T's to D's.
Hey, fuggeddaboud id!
Id?
You said change Ts to Ds!
Not the last one! OK, forget that one, try this one, "Get the hell outta here." No Rs.
Get the hail outta hee.
Not hee! Heah!
Hee!
Here.
[Hands Michael a pistol]
Stick it in your pants, maybe you'll look the part.

[after learning Frank is a mobster]
Note to self... rent Goodfellas, Casino, Godfather 1, 2, 3.
Well at least tell me what his restaurant is called, then I can sneak in, in a beard or something.
It's called The La Trattoria.
You mean La Trattoria.
No.
The La Trattoria means The The Trattoria.
I know.
Interesting. Look I have to go to the La Bathroom, and I'll be back in a sec.
[Gina is trying to explain to Michael why she can't marry him]
I can't talk about this in the house.
[Gina begins throwing on clothes over her pajamas]
Where are we going?
Out.
Right. Nowhere too dressy, I hope
And how would you like that cooked?
Ree.
Excuse me?
Rah.
Raw?
Rahr.
Rare? And to drink?
Bee.
Beer?
Yah.
You talk funny.
The boy's got an IQ of 174 and what do you get? An idiot.
Just a little screw-up. But what the hee? Me got it under contwol. Fuggedaboudid.
Just stop. Otherwise, I can't go on. Just run normally.
I am running normally.
Oh. Right. I'm sorry. I thought, you know... I guess I haven't seen you run before and I thought you were doing a funny run.
A funny run? That's my run.
Listen, did Gina just come back?
She came back, all right, crying her eyes out. She packed a bag, ran straight back out again. What the hell you been doing to her?
I asked her to marry me.

[Frank's about to 'shoot' Michael]
This is probably a stupid question, but is this going to hurt?
No. You won't feel a thing.
[FBI device with fake blood detonates]
That actually hurt quite a lot. Is it suppose to hurt that much?

[meeting Gina's father, after looking in a walk-in freezer]
There's a man in your freezer.
Yeah, I know. He's suppose to be there.

[referring to the dead body]
We're gonna need a bag.
Right.

[returns with a sandwich bag]
What the hell am I suppose to do with that?
I thought maybe the gun?

[after Gina becomes desperate]
Well, no. I'm sorry but I've waited all my life to find someone I love as much as I love you. And I'm just not going to let this or anyone come between us. Not Vito "The Butcher" or Vinnie "The Baker" or anyone involved in any kind of food preparation. That's it, end of story.

[to Gina when she doesn't want her cookie]
Eat Fucking Cookie!
